member.name: T:Google.API.GoogleClient
member.summary: The abstract base class for all google service client classes.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.AcceptLanguage
member.summary: This optional argument supplies the host language of the application making the request. If this argument is not present then the system will choose a value based on the value of the Accept-Language http header. If this header is not present, a value of en is assumed.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.ApiKey
member.summary: This optional argument supplies the application's key. If specified, it must be a valid key associated with your site which is validated against the passed referer header. The advantage of supplying a key is so that we can identify and contact you should something go wrong with your application. Without a key, we will still take the same appropriate measures on our side, but we will not be able to contact you. It is definitely best for you to pass a key.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.Referrer
member.summary: Gets or sets the http referrer header. Applications MUST always include a valid and accurate http referer header in their requests. The default value is http://code.google.com/p/google-api-for-dotnet/.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.OpenTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of time after which the open method, invoked by a communication object, times out.
member.returns: The that specifies the interval of time to wait for the open method to time out.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.CloseTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of time after which the close method, invoked by a communication object, times out.
member.returns: The that specifies the interval of time to wait for the close method to time out.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.SendTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of time after which the send method, invoked by a communication object, times out.
member.returns: The that specifies the interval of time to wait for the send method to time out.

member.name: P:Google.API.GoogleClient.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of time after which the receive method, invoked by a communication object, times out.
member.returns: The that specifies the interval of time to wait for the receive method to time out.

member.name: M:Google.API.GoogleAPIException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Google.API.GoogleAPIException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Google.API.GoogleAPIException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Google.API.GoogleAPIException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Google.API.Search.INewsImage
member.summary: A image that represents a news article.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsImage.Url
member.summary: Gets the the URL of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsImage.OriginalContextUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL of the page containing the image.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsImage.Publisher
member.summary: Gets the name of the publisher of the image.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.Title
member.summary: supplies the title of the article associated with the image

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: same as above but stripped of HTML formatting

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.Url
member.summary: supplies the URL of the image

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.OriginalContextUrl
member.summary: supplies the URL of the article that contains this image. The image, when displayed, should normally link through this URL

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.Publisher
member.summary: supplies the publisher of the news article containing the image. The suggested user interface is to display this under or in close proximity to the image, hyper linked through the .url property from above

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.TbWidth
member.summary: supplies the width of the image referenced above. The standard size of this image is 80 pixels wide and 50 pixels tall

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsImage.TbHeight
member.summary: supplies the height of the image referenced above. The standard size of this image is 80 pixels wide and 50 pixels tall

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ITbImage.Url
member.summary: Gets the url of the thumbnail image.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ITbImage.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the thumbnail image.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ITbImage.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the thumbnail image.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Url
member.summary: Gets the the URL of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Latitude
member.summary: Gets the latitude value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Longitude
member.summary: Gets the longitude value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets the street address and number for the given result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.City
member.summary: Gets the city name for the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Region
member.summary: Gets the region name for the result (e.g., in the us, this is typically a state abbreviation, in other regions it might be a province, etc.).

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Country
member.summary: Gets the country name for the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.PhoneNumbers
member.summary: Gets an array of phone numbers.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.AddressLines
member.summary: Supplies an array consisting of the mailing address lines for this result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.DirectionUrl
member.summary: Gets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from the center of the set of search results to this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.ToHereDirectionUrl
member.summary: Gets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from a user specified location to this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.FromHereDirectionUrl
member.summary: Gets a url that can be used to provide driving directions from this search result to a user specified location.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.StaticMap
member.summary: Gets a static map image representation of the current result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.ListingType
member.summary: Gets the type of this result which can either be "local" in the case of a local business listing or geocode result, or "kml" in the case of a KML listing.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.ILocalResult.Content
member.summary: For "kml" results, this property contains a content snippet associated with the KML result. For "local" results, this property is the empty string.

member.name: M:Google.API.Search.GnewsSearchClient.Search(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,Google.API.Search.SortType,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: A particular location of the news. You must supply either a city, state, country, or zip code as in "Santa Barbara" or "British Columbia" or "Peru" or "93108".
This optional argument tells the news search system to scope search results to include only quote typed results.
This optional argument tells the news search system to scope search results to a particular topic.
This optional argument tells the news search system which edition of news to pull results from.
member.remarks: Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.

member.name: M:Google.API.Search.GnewsSearchClient.SearchLocal(System.String,System.Int32,Google.API.Search.SortType)
member.param: A particular location of the news. You must supply either a city, state, country, or zip code as in "Santa Barbara" or "British Columbia" or "Peru" or "93108".
member.remarks: Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Title
member.summary: Supplies the title for the result. In some cases, the title and the streetAddress are the same. This typically occurs when the search term is a street address such as 1231 Lisa Lane, Los Altos, CA.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Supplies the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.)

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Url
member.summary: Supplies a url to a Google Maps Details page associated with the search result

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Latitude
member.summary: Supplies the latitude value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Longitude
member.summary: Supplies the longitude value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.StreetAddress
member.summary: Supplies the street address and number for the given result. Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "" if the result has no known street address. address line.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.City
member.summary: Supplies the city name for the result. Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Region
member.summary: Supplies a region name for the result (e.g., in the us, this is typically a state abbreviation, in other regions it might be a province, etc.) Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Country
member.summary: Supplies a country name for the result. Note:, in some cases, this property may be set to "".

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.PhoneNumbers
member.summary: Supplies an array of phone number objects

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.AddressLines
member.summary: Supplies an array consisting of the mailing address lines for this result

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.DirectionUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url that can be used to provide driving directions from the center of the set of search results to this search result. Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.ToHereDirectionUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url that can be used to provide driving directions from a user specified location to this search result. Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.FromHereDirectionUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url that can be used to provide driving directions from this search result to a user specified location. Note, in some cases this property may be missing or null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.StaticMapUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url to a static map image representation of the current result. The image is 150px wide by 100px tall with a single marker representing the current location. Expected usage is to hyperlink this image using the url property.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.ListingType
member.summary: This property indicates the type of this result which can either be "local" in the case of a local business listing or geocode result, or "kml" in the case of a KML listing.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GlocalResult.Content
member.summary: For "kml" results, this property contains a content snippet associated with the KML result. For "local" results, this property is the empty string.

member.name: T:Google.API.HttpUtility
member.summary: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Google.API.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

member.name: M:Google.API.HttpUtility.RemoveHtmlTags(System.String)
member.summary: Capture the text content from a html formatted string.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IWebResult.VisibleUrl
member.summary: Gets a shortened version of the URL associated with the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IWebResult.CacheUrl
member.summary: Gets a url to google's cached version of the page responsible for producting this result. This property may be null indicating that there is no cache, and it might be out of date in cases where the search result has been saved and in the mean time, the cache has gone stale. For best results, this property should not be persisted.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IWebResult.Content
member.summary: Gets a brief snippet of information from the page associated with the search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IPhoneNumber.Type
member.summary: Gets the of this phone number. It can be one of "main", "fax", "mobile", "data", or "".

member.name: T:Google.API.Search.INewsResultItem
member.summary: A story of news search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResultItem.Publisher
member.summary: Gets the name of the publisher of the news story.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResultItem.Location
member.summary: Gets the location of the news story. This is a list of locations in most specific to least specific order where the components are seperated by ",". Note, there may only be one element in the list... A typical value for this property is "Edinburgh,Scotland,UK" or possibly "USA".

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResultItem.PublishedDate
member.summary: Gets the published date of the news story referenced by this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResultItem.Language
member.summary: Gets the language of the news story.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.Title
member.summary: Supplies the title value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Supplies the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.)

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.UnescapedUrl
member.summary: Supplies the raw URL of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.Url
member.summary: Supplies an escaped version of the above URL.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.Publisher
member.summary: Supplies the name of the publisher of the news story.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.Location
member.summary: Contains the location of the news story. This is a list of locations in most specific to least specific order where the components are seperated by ",". Note, there may only be one element in the list... A typical value for this property is "Edinburgh,Scotland,UK" or possibly "USA".

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.PublishedDateString
member.summary: Supplies the published date (rfc-822 format) of the news story referenced by this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResultItem.Language
member.summary: This property is optional. When present, it indicates the language of the news story.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.ClusterUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL points to a landing page that points to all of the related stories. When a news result has a set of related stories, this URL is available and non-null. Otherwise, it is null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.Content
member.summary: Gets a snippet of content from the news story associated with this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.RelatedStories
member.summary: Gets a set of closely related stories. If there is no related story it will return null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.Image
member.summary: Gets a image that represents the cluster of news articles related to this result. If there is no good image for this result it will return null.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.Author
member.summary: Gets the name of the person that the quote is attributed to. Note, you can get the author only when this is a quote.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.INewsResult.IsQuote
member.summary: Gets whether it is a quote or a normal news.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResult.ClusterUrl
member.summary: When a news result has a set of related stories, this URL is available and non-null. In this situation, the URL points to a landing page that points to all of the related stories.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResult.Content
member.summary: Supplies a snippet of content from the news story associated with this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResult.RelatedStories
member.summary: This property is optional. It only appears in a result when the story also has a set of closely related stories. In this case, the relatedStories[] array will be present.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GnewsResult.Image
member.summary: This property is optional. It only appears in a result when the system has determined that there is a good image that represents the cluster of news articles related to this result.

member.name: F:Google.API.Search.SafeLevel.moderate
member.summary: Enables moderate safe search filtering. Default value.

member.name: F:Google.API.Search.SafeLevel.active
member.summary: Enables the highest level of safe search filtering.

member.name: T:Google.API.Search.FileType

member.name: F:Google.API.Search.LocalResultType.localonly

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GpatentResult.ApplicationDateString

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GpatentResult.PatentNumber

member.summary: Supplies the status of the patent which can either be "filed" for filed, but not yet issued patents, or "issued" for issued patents.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GpatentResult.Assignee
member.summary: Supplies the assignee of the patent.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GpatentResult.TbUrl

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBookResult.Authors

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBookResult.BookId

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Supplies the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.)

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.UnescapedUrl
member.summary: Supplies the raw URL of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.Url
member.summary: Supplies an escaped version of the above URL.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.Authors
member.summary: Supplies the list of authors of the book.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.BookId
member.summary: Supplies the identifier associated with the book. This is typically an ISBN.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.PublishedYearString
member.summary: Supplies the year that the book was published.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.PageCount
member.summary: Supplies the number of pages contained within the book.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.TbWidth
member.summary: Supplies the width in pixels of the book cover thumbnail.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.TbHeight
member.summary: Supplies the height in pixels of the book cover thumbnail.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GbookResult.TbUrl
member.summary: Supplies the url of a thumbnail image which visually represents book cover.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBlogResult.PostUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL to the blog post referenced in this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBlogResult.Content
member.summary: Gets a snippet of content from the blog post associated with this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBlogResult.Author
member.summary: Gets the name of the author that wrote the blog post.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBlogResult.BlogUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL of the blog which contains the post.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IBlogResult.PublishedDate
member.summary: Gets the published date of the blog post referenced by this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.Title
member.summary: Supplies the title value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Supplies the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.)

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.PostUrl
member.summary: Supplies the URL to the blog post referenced in this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.Content
member.summary: Supplies a snippet of content from the blog post associated with this search result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.Author
member.summary: Supplies the name of the author that wrote the blog post.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.BlogUrl
member.summary: Supplies the URL of the blog which contains the post. Typically, this URL is displayed in green, beneath the blog search result and is linked to the blog.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GblogResult.PublishedDateString
member.summary: Supplies the published date (rfc-822 format) of the blog post referenced by this search result.

member.name: T:Google.API.Search.GnewsSearcher

member.remarks: Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.

member.remarks: Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.

member.name: M:Google.API.Search.GnewsSearcher.Search(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: A particular location of the news. You must supply either a city, state, country, or zip code as in "Santa Barbara" or "British Columbia" or "Peru" or "93108".

member.summary: Gets the title of the video result.

member.summary: Gets a snippet style description of the video clip.

member.summary: Gets the url of a playable version of the video result.

member.summary: Gets the published date of the video.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.Publisher
member.summary: Gets the name of the video's publisher.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.Duration
member.summary: Gets the approximate duration, in seconds, of the video.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.TbImage
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail image which visually represents the video.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.PlayUrl
member.summary: Gets the url of the flash version of the video that can be played inline on your page.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.VideoType
member.summary: Gets the video type of the video result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.Author
member.summary: Gets the author. If present, this property supplies the YouTube user name of the author of the video.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.ViewCount
member.summary: Gets the view count. If present, this property supplies a count of the number of plays for this video.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.IVideoResult.Rating
member.summary: Gets the rating. If present, this property supplies the rating of the video on a scale of 1 to 5.

member.summary: Supplies the url of a playable version of the video result.

member.summary: Supplies the raw URL of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.Url
member.summary: Supplies an escaped version of the above URL.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.VisibleUrl
member.summary: Supplies a shortened version of the URL associated with the result. Typically displayed in green, stripped of a protocol and path.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.CacheUrl
member.summary: Supplies a url to google's cached version of the page responsible for producting this result. This property may be null indicating that there is no cache, and it might be out of date in cases where the search result has been saved and in the mean time, the cache has gone stale. For best results, this property should not be persisted.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.Title
member.summary: Supplies the title value of the result.

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.TitleNoFormatting
member.summary: Supplies the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.)

member.name: P:Google.API.Search.GwebResult.Content
member.summary: Supplies a brief snippet of information from the page associated with the search result.

member.name: M:Google.API.Search.GpatentSearcher.Search(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Whether restrict the search to ONLY patents that having been issued, skiping all patents that have only been filed.
Whether restrict the search to ONLY patents that only been filed, skipping over all patents that have been issued.
member.remarks: When both issuedOnly and filedOnly are true, it equals to both are false. Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.

member.param: Whether restrict the search to ONLY patents that having been issued, skiping all patents that have only been filed.

member.remarks: When both issuedOnly and filedOnly are true, it equals to both are false. Now, the max count of items Google given is 32.
